subject: Trades (Sports)
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Beltran, who is expected to be traded before the Mets return from a 10-game trip, was 0 for 3 on Thursday and received louder ovations than usual.
snippet: Carlos Beltran, who is expected to be traded before the Mets return from a 10-game trip, was 0 for 3 on Thursday and received louder ovations than usual.
